import React, { useEffect } from 'react' import { v4 as uuidv4 } from 'uuid'; import PostInputBar from './PostInputBar' import { Card } from 'react-bootstrap' import { RiWalkFill } from "react-icons/ri"; import { FcLike, FcSms } from "react-icons/fc"; import { useSelector, useDispatch, } from 'react-redux' import { fetchPosts, addLikes, currentUser, } from '../redux/actions' const Feeds = () => { const allPosts = useSelector(state => state.posts.posts) console.log(allPosts.map(post => post.user.id)) const currentUserId = useSelector(state => state.users.getcurrentuser.data.id) console.log(currentUserId) useEffect(() => { dispatch(fetchPosts()) }, []) const postLikesLength = useSelector(state => state.posts.likes.length) // console.log(postLikesLength) const dispatch = useDispatch() const ID = uuidv4() const handleUserPostLikes = (e, id, username) => { // console.log('click', id, username) } return (
{allPosts?.reverse().map((post, i) => ( <>
{post.user?.username}
posted at {post.createdAt}
{post.text}
handleUserPostLikes(post.user?.id)} className="text-sm flex align-items-center cursor-pointer ">
< FcLike />
{postLikesLength}
Comment
Follow
)) }
) } export default Feeds
